name: Emily Rodriguez
dreams_and_goals: Finding a spacious home with a backyard and play area for her children
Living in a safe and friendly neighborhood with good schools
Being able to work from home and spend more time with her family
pain_points_and_challenges: Finding a home that is both spacious and affordable
Navigating the home buying process with young children and a busy work schedule
Balancing the needs of her family and her own professional goals
how_to_empower: Provide a customized search for family-friendly properties in safe neighborhoods with good schools
Offer guidance and support throughout the home buying process, including scheduling home tours around her busy schedule
Provide resources and referrals for home inspection services, contractors, and child care services
